concept.title: Architectural specification: Learning and training
concept.shortdesc: DITA 1.2 introduces the learning and training specializations, which are designed for developing instructional materials. They use all of base DITA and some (but not all) parts of the Technical Content package.

draft-comment.author: Kristen Eberlein
draft-comment.p: I'm confused as to why learning and training is the overarching title at this point. What follows is an introduction to DITA in general, and not just learning and training specialization. rhamilton updated comment 14/3/2014 00:50:35 1
